repairedDockerfile:
######################
# Dependencies image #
######################
FROM golang:1.17-alpine as builder

RUN apk --update-cache --no-cache add upx curl

# Setup build directory
RUN mkdir -p /build
WORKDIR /build

# Fetch deps first as they don't change frequently
COPY go.mod /build/go.mod
COPY go.sum /build/go.sum
RUN go mod download
